daily_summary.headline: Exciting Space Events on the Horizon

top_events.title: Aurora Opportunity
top_events.description: A G1 level geomagnetic storm is expected, offering potential aurora visibility at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check visibility conditions and prepare for aurora viewing.

top_events.title: Long March 2F/G Launch
top_events.description: Launch of the Chinese Reusable Space Vehicle, a significant step in reusable space technology.
top_events.action: Watch the live stream for updates on this reusable vehicle test.

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 Starlink Launch
top_events.description: Deployment of Starlink satellites to enhance global internet coverage.
top_events.action: Tune in to the live stream to watch the deployment.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65째+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
